# Task

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example



# Data

wrap_string("This function will wrap words into lines")

# Solution

```julia
function wrap_string(text::AbstractString, text_width::Int=10)
    lines = split(text)
    new_lines = Vector{String}()

    for line in lines
        if length(line) > text_width
            for i in 1:length(line) - text_width + 1
                push!(new_lines, substring(line, 1:text_width))
            end
        else
            push!(new_lines, line)
        end
    end

    return join(new_lines, "\n")
end
```

# Example

```julia
wrap_string("This function will wrap words into lines") # Output: "This function\nwill wrap words\ninto lines"
```
